name: Near End
description:
Update 1.1.0: Many Bugs Fixed / The Zombie is Slower

Your father is trying to kill you. Pick up the car parts and run away before your dad kills you.

Start running as soon as the game starts

               

How To Play:

W/A/S/D – Move

E – Interaction
